name: Mr. Great President
description:
“ ‘You are the greatest President of all time ‘ - everyone “ -Donald Drumpf.

The objective of the game is for you to understand what is it like to be most powerful man in the world. As a President, your task is to watch TV, tweet about whatever you want, call your BFF Pudding, and especially avoid FAKE NEWs!

Control: Use your mouse and explore the ridiculousness of what this game offers…

(also very buggie, pls forgivie)
